divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog, when arriving home I looked up in the sky and noticed an object which was very shiny and was moving slowly towards the NE when it started fading and totally dissappeared. A few moments later my husband and I noticed an airplane (looked like military type) flying in the same direction where I last saw the object. When I saw the object, I knew right away it wasn't a plane or helicopter. I was mesmerized by it, trying to decided what it was. When it disappeared I knew it wasn't normal.
Summary: a shining object in the sky disappears as it moves
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 32 other sightings in Bakersfield
There were no other sightings in Bakersfield on or around July 20th 2005
This sighting has never been favorited.
